message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $120.
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $135.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $125.
I'm not willing to go below $140, Bob. I think the product is worth more than that. I'm willing to make a compromise at $142.50.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with an offer of $137.5.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $139, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose an offer of $137.
I'm not willing to go below $138, Bob. I'm starting to think you're not serious about buying this product. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at $138.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose an offer of $136.
